This is how it is written:

This is a more advance example of usage the
when some of the style is being modified:

::ShButton
---
ui: 
  wrapper: shadow-2xl
  rounded: rounded-full # options: rounded, rounded-md, rounded-lg & rounded-full
urlButton: https://www.nasa.gov/ # this is a comment to the link to the button.
target: "" # open in the same window
rounded: rounded-3xl
colorButton: green
disabled: true # true, false
styleButton: solid
fullWidth: "" # changes the button width
size: 3xl # modifies the size of the button
---
[]{.i-fa6-brands-square-github .text-4xl} ClickMe!!!  
::

It is possible to insert other constructors inside of the
constructor. The other components are supported as well.
In this repository all the content is Open Sounce and it's can be used accordigly to it's LICENSE.

---
urlButton: "https://opensource.org/"
styleButton: outline
colorButton: blue
fullWidth: true
---

These are the properties and attributes to define and style
property is a comprehensive configuration object that allows for the customization of various styling aspects of the button component. Each attribute within the
property targets a specific part of the button's appearance and layout, providing detailed control over its design.
Defines the overall styling for the container that holds all the elements of the button. The
attribute is used to ensure the button is aligned properly within its container, with appropriate margins, e.g.,
Specifies the styling for the inner content of the button, ensuring it is centered and does not inherit any prose-related styles, making it suitable for standalone button components, e.g.,
Represents the URL to which the button will navigate when clicked. It can be used to define external or internal links for the button's action.
Defines the text label displayed on the button. This attribute ensures the button conveys its intended action clearly to the user.
Specifies where to open the linked document. Common values include
for a new window or tab,
for the full body of the window.
Determines the primary color scheme for the button. The value
sets a default color, which can be customized by replacing
in the styleButton styles with the desired color name.
Defines the border-radius of the button, making the edges rounded. The default class
) that indicates whether the button is disabled. When true, the button is not interactive and is usually styled to look inactive.
Specifies the style styleButton of the button, which can be
. Each styleButton applies different styling rules, such as background colors, border styles, and text decorations.
) defines whether the button should be displayed as a fullWidth element, taking the full width of its container.
Sets the size of the button, ranging from
. Each size corresponds to predefined text and padding sizes, ensuring consistency across different button sizes.
Defines whether the button should be displayed inline with other elements. The class
ensures the button aligns properly with the surrounding content. It is advised
Sets the padding for the button, with options ranging from
. Each padding size corresponds to predefined padding values, ensuring the button's content is appropriately spaced. It is recommended to
modify these values as it is synced with the

  styleButton: {
    solid: 'bg-{colorButton}-500 dark:bg-{colorButton}-400 text-white dark:text-gray-900 no-underline',
    outline: 'text-{colorButton}-500 dark:text-{colorButton}-400 ring-1 ring-inset ring-{colorButton}-500 dark:ring-{colorButton}-400 no-underline',
    link: 'text-{colorButton}-500 hover:text-{colorButton}-600 disabled:text-{colorButton}-500 dark:text-{colorButton}-400 dark:hover:text-{colorButton}-500 dark:disabled:text-{colorButton}-400 underline-offset-4 hover:underline focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-inset focus-visible:ring-{colorButton}-500 dark:focus-visible:ring-{colorButton}-400'
  },

These represent the class values utilized in the
constructor. These values are customizable and can be strengthened or overridden through the
: Defines the alignment and margin for the container. The value "align-middle m-1" centers the element vertically (align-middle) and adds a margin of 1 unit (m-1).
: Specifies styles for inner content. The value "text-center not-prose mx-auto" centers the text (text-center), excludes prose formatting (not-prose), and centers horizontally (mx-auto).
: Defines styles for a solid button. The value includes background color based on
(bg-{colorButton}-500, dark:bg-{colorButton}-400), white text color (text-white), dark mode text color (dark:text-gray-900), and no underline (no-underline).
: Defines styles for an outlined button. The value includes text color based on
(text-{colorButton}-500, dark:text-{colorButton}-400), an inset ring with color based on
(ring-1 ring-inset ring-{colorButton}-500, dark:ring-{colorButton}-400), and no underline (no-underline).

'text-{colorButton}-500 hover:text-{colorButton}-600 disabled:text-{colorButton}-500 dark:text-{colorButton}-400 dark:hover:text-{colorButton}-500 dark:disabled:text-{colorButton}-400 underline-offset-4 hover:underline focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-inset focus-visible:ring-{colorButton}-500 dark:focus-visible:ring-{colorButton}-400'
: Defines styles for a link button. The value includes text color based on

(text-{colorButton}-500, dark:text-{colorButton}-400), hover text color (hover:text-{colorButton}-600, dark:hover:text-{colorButton}-500), disabled text color (disabled:text-{colorButton}-500, dark:disabled:text-{colorButton}-400), underline offset (underline-offset-4), hover underline (hover:underline), and focus-visible ring with color based on
: Defines styles for full width elements. The value "w-full flex justify-center items-center" makes the element take full width (w-full), centers it using flexbox (flex justify-center items-center).
: Defines styles for inline elements. The value "inline-flex items-center" sets inline flex display (inline-flex) and centers items vertically (items-center).
: Defines the border radius. The value "rounded-md" applies a medium border radius.

{
'2xs': 'text-xs',
xs: 'text-xs',
sm: 'text-sm',
md: 'text-md',
base: 'text-base',
lg: 'text-lg',
xl: 'text-xl',
'2xl': 'text-2xl',
'3xl': 'text-3xl',
'4xl': 'text-4xl',
'5xl': 'text-5xl'
}
: Defines text sizes for various options. Each value represents a different text size class from extra small (text-xs) to five times extra large (text-5xl).
: Defines padding sizes for various options. Each value represents different padding classes for different sizes.

: Defines default settings. The value includes default text size (size: 'base'), default button style (styleButton: 'solid'), default button color (colorButton: 'primary'), and default link target (target: '_blank').
These style properties ensure that the
component is visually appealing and flexible, allowing for a wide range of customization to meet specific design requirements.
